alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:40PM CDT until September 07 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Franklin County in southwestern Mississippi... Northeastern Adams County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 540 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Stampley, or 7 miles southwest of Fayette, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Roxie, Kirby, Hamburg, and Mcnair around 545 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
